- VIDEO: V√≠deo

parameters.query:
-- ===================================================
-- PROCESSAMENTO COMPLETO DE MENSAGEM WHATSAPP v4
-- ===================================================
BEGIN;

-- 1. INSERIR/ATUALIZAR MEMBRO
WITH upsert_member AS (
  INSERT INTO members (phone, name, profile_name, last_seen)
  VALUES ($2, $3, $3, to_timestamp($4::bigint / 1000.0))
  ON CONFLICT (phone) 
  DO UPDATE SET 
    name = EXCLUDED.name,
    profile_name = EXCLUDED.profile_name,
    last_seen = EXCLUDED.last_seen,
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  RETURNING id, phone, name
),
-- 2. INSERIR/ATUALIZAR RELACIONAMENTO MEMBRO-GRUPO
upsert_member_group AS (
  INSERT INTO members_groups (member_id, group_id, joined_at)
  SELECT um.id, $1::bigint, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  FROM upsert_member um
  ON CONFLICT (member_id, group_id)
  DO UPDATE SET 
    status = 'active',
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  WHERE members_groups.status != 'active'
  RETURNING member_id, group_id
),
-- 3. INSERIR MENSAGEM
insert_message AS (
  INSERT INTO messages (
    message_id, 
    group_id, 
    member_id, 
    message, 
    type, 
    media_url, 
    media_size, 
    response_to, 
    response_to_id, 
    timestamp
  )
  SELECT 
    $5,                                       -- message_id
    $1::bigint,                              -- group_id
    um.id,                                   -- member_id
    CASE 
      WHEN $6 = 'null' THEN NULL 
      ELSE $6::text 
    END,                                     -- message text
    -- Valida√ß√£o e normaliza√ß√£o do tipo
    CASE 
      WHEN LOWER($7) IN ('text', 'audio', 'image', 'video', 'document', 'sticker', 'location', 'contact', 'poll', 'reaction') 
      THEN LOWER($7)::text
      ELSE 'text'::text
    END,
    CASE 
      WHEN $8 = 'null' THEN NULL 
      ELSE $8::text 
    END,                                     -- media_url
    CASE 
      WHEN $8 = 'null' OR $8 IS NULL THEN NULL 
      ELSE 0 
    END,                                     -- media_size
    CASE 
      WHEN $9 = 'null' THEN NULL 
      ELSE $9::text 
    END,                                     -- response_to
    CASE 
      WHEN $10 = 'null' THEN NULL 
      ELSE $10::text 
    END,                                     -- response_to_id
    to_timestamp($4::bigint / 1000.0)        -- timestamp
  FROM upsert_member um
  WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM messages WHERE message_id = $5
  )
  RETURNING id, type, group_id, member_id
),
-- 4. ATUALIZAR/INSERIR ATIVIDADE DI√ÅRIA
upsert_activity AS (
  INSERT INTO members_activity (
    member_id, 
    group_id, 
    activity_date, 
    message_count, 
    media_count, 
    reaction_count
  )
  SELECT 
    um.id,
    $1::bigint,
    (to_timestamp($4::bigint / 1000.0) AT TIME ZONE 'America/Sao_Paulo')::date,
    CASE 
      WHEN LOWER($7) IN ('text', 'sticker', 'location', 'contact', 'poll') OR LOWER($7) NOT IN ('audio', 'image', 'video', 'document', 'reaction') 
      THEN 1 ELSE 0 
    END,
    CASE WHEN LOWER($7) IN ('audio', 'image', 'video', 'document') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,
    CASE WHEN LOWER($7) = 'reaction' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
  FROM upsert_member um
  WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM insert_message)
  ON CONFLICT (member_id, group_id, activity_date)
  DO UPDATE SET 
    message_count = members_activity.message_count + EXCLUDED.message_count,
    media_count = members_activity.media_count + EXCLUDED.media_count,
    reaction_count = members_activity.reaction_count + EXCLUDED.reaction_count,
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  RETURNING member_id, group_id, activity_date, message_count, media_count, reaction_count
)
-- 5. RETORNAR RESULTADO CONSOLIDADO
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN im.id IS NOT NULL THEN 'success'
    WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM messages WHERE message_id = $5) THEN 'duplicate'
    ELSE 'error'
  END as status,
  json_build_object(
    'member', json_build_object(
      'id', um.id,
      'phone', um.phone,
      'name', um.name
    ),
    'message', CASE 
      WHEN im.id IS NOT NULL THEN json_build_object(
        'id', im.id,
        'type', im.type,
        'saved_at', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
      )
      ELSE json_build_object('status', 'not_inserted')
    END,
    'activity', CASE
      WHEN ua.activity_date IS NOT NULL THEN json_build_object(
        'date', ua.activity_date,
        'messages', ua.message_count,
        'media', ua.media_count,
        'reactions', ua.reaction_count
      )
      ELSE NULL
    END,
    'processing_info', json_build_object(
      'timestamp', to_timestamp($4::bigint / 1000.0),
      'group_id', $1,
      'message_type', LOWER($7),
      'has_media', $8 != 'null' AND $8 IS NOT NULL,
      'is_response', $10 != 'null' AND $10 IS NOT NULL
    )
  ) as result
FROM upsert_member um
LEFT JOIN insert_message im ON TRUE
LEFT JOIN upsert_activity ua ON TRUE;

COMMIT;

-- PROCESSAMENTO DE √ÅUDIO/VOZ - VERS√ÉO CORRIGIDA COMPLETA
BEGIN;

-- Buscar o ID interno do grupo
WITH group_lookup AS (
  SELECT id as group_id_internal
  FROM groups 
  WHERE chat_id = $1
),
upsert_member AS (
  INSERT INTO members (phone, name, profile_name, last_seen)
  VALUES ($2, $3, $3, to_timestamp($4::bigint / 1000))
  ON CONFLICT (phone) 
  DO UPDATE SET 
    name = EXCLUDED.name,
    profile_name = EXCLUDED.profile_name,
    last_seen = EXCLUDED.last_seen,
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  RETURNING id, phone, name
),
upsert_member_group AS (
  INSERT INTO members_groups (member_id, group_id, joined_at)
  SELECT um.id, gl.group_id_internal, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  FROM upsert_member um
  CROSS JOIN group_lookup gl
  ON CONFLICT (member_id, group_id)
  DO UPDATE SET 
    status = 'active'
  WHERE members_groups.status != 'active'
  RETURNING member_id, group_id
),
insert_message AS (
  INSERT INTO messages (
    message_id, group_id, member_id, message, type, 
    media_url, response_to, response_to_id, timestamp
  )
  SELECT 
    $5,                                              -- message_id
    gl.group_id_internal,                           -- group_id (lookup)
    um.id,                                          -- member_id
    COALESCE(NULLIF($6, ''), '[√Åudio]'),           -- message ($6 - text)
    LOWER($7),                                      -- type ($7 - convertido para min√∫sculo)
    NULLIF($8, ''),                                 -- media_url ($8)
    NULLIF($9, ''),                                 -- response_to ($9)
    NULLIF($10, ''),                                -- response_to_id ($10)
    to_timestamp($4::bigint / 1000)                 -- timestamp
  FROM upsert_member um
  CROSS JOIN group_lookup gl
  ON CONFLICT (message_id) DO NOTHING
  RETURNING id, type, message
),
upsert_activity AS (
  INSERT INTO members_activity (member_id, group_id, activity_date, message_count, media_count)
  SELECT um.id, gl.group_id_internal, CURRENT_DATE, 0, 1
  FROM upsert_member um
  CROSS JOIN group_lookup gl
  ON CONFLICT (member_id, group_id, activity_date)
  DO UPDATE SET 
    media_count = members_activity.media_count + 1,
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  RETURNING member_id, media_count
),
-- CRIAR ENTRADA PARA AN√ÅLISE DE CONTE√öDO (TRANSCRI√á√ÉO)
insert_content_analysis AS (
  INSERT INTO content_analysis (message_id, content_type, processing_status)
  SELECT im.id, 'audio', 'pending'
  FROM insert_message im
  WHERE $11::boolean = true  -- auto_transcription_enabled ($11)
  RETURNING id, processing_status
)
SELECT 
  'audio_processed' as status,
  json_build_object(
    'member_id', um.id,
    'member_name', um.name,
    'group_id_internal', gl.group_id_internal,
    'message_id', im.id,
    'message_content', im.message,
    'message_type', im.type,
    'media_count', ua.media_count,
    'transcription_queued', CASE WHEN $11::boolean THEN true ELSE false END
  ) as result
FROM upsert_member um
CROSS JOIN group_lookup gl
CROSS JOIN insert_message im
CROSS JOIN upsert_activity ua;

COMMIT;

-- PROCESSAMENTO DE REA√á√ÉO
BEGIN;

WITH upsert_member AS (
  INSERT INTO members (phone, name, profile_name, last_seen)
  VALUES ($2, $3, $3, to_timestamp($4))
  ON CONFLICT (phone) 
  DO UPDATE SET 
    name = EXCLUDED.name,
    profile_name = EXCLUDED.profile_name,
    last_seen = EXCLUDED.last_seen,
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  RETURNING id, phone, name
),

upsert_member_group AS (
  INSERT INTO members_groups (member_id, group_id, joined_at)
  SELECT um.id, $1::bigint, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  FROM upsert_member um
  ON CONFLICT (member_id, group_id)
  DO UPDATE SET 
    status = 'active',
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  WHERE members_groups.status != 'active'
  RETURNING member_id, group_id
),

insert_reaction AS (
  INSERT INTO messages (
    message_id, group_id, member_id, message, type, 
    response_to, response_to_id, timestamp
  )
  SELECT 
    $5, $1::bigint, um.id, $6, 'reaction',
    NULLIF($9, ''), NULLIF($10, ''), to_timestamp($4)
  FROM upsert_member um
  ON CONFLICT (message_id) DO NOTHING
  RETURNING id, message, response_to_id
),

upsert_activity AS (
  INSERT INTO members_activity (member_id, group_id, activity_date, reaction_count)
  SELECT um.id, $1::bigint, CURRENT_DATE, 1
  FROM upsert_member um
  ON CONFLICT (member_id, group_id, activity_date)
  DO UPDATE SET 
    reaction_count = members_activity.reaction_count + 1,
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  RETURNING member_id, reaction_count
)

SELECT 
  'reaction_processed' as status,
  json_build_object(
    'member_id', um.id,
    'reaction_id', ir.id,
    'reaction_emoji', ir.message,
    'reacted_to_message', ir.response_to_id,
    'total_reactions_today', ua.reaction_count
  ) as result
FROM upsert_member um
CROSS JOIN insert_reaction ir
CROSS JOIN upsert_activity ua;

COMMIT;

=# Especialista em An√°lise de Documentos e Imagens

## Sua Fun√ß√£o
Voc√™ √© um especialista em an√°lise de conte√∫do extra√≠do de imagens, capaz de interpretar documentos, posts, gr√°ficos, e qualquer tipo de conte√∫do visual que foi convertido em texto via OCR.

## Instru√ß√µes de An√°lise

### 1. INTERPRETA√á√ÉO DO CONTE√öDO
- Analise o texto extra√≠do da imagem
- Identifique o tipo de documento/conte√∫do
- Compreenda o contexto e prop√≥sito
- Organize as informa√ß√µes de forma l√≥gica

### 2. TIPOS DE CONTE√öDO COMUNS
**Documentos Fiscais:**
- Notas fiscais, cupons, recibos
- Extraia: estabelecimento, itens, valores, data

**Posts/Redes Sociais:**
- Tweets, posts LinkedIn, Instagram
- Extraia: mensagem principal, m√©tricas, insights

**Gr√°ficos/Relat√≥rios:**
- Dashboards, funis, m√©tricas
- Extraia: dados principais, tend√™ncias, conclus√µes

**Curr√≠culos/CVs:**
- Experi√™ncias, forma√ß√£o, habilidades
- Extraia: qualifica√ß√µes principais, experi√™ncia relevante

**Pesquisas/Formul√°rios:**
- Resultados, feedback, dados coletados
- Extraia: insights principais, padr√µes, conclus√µes

### 3. FORMATO DE RESPOSTA

Forne√ßa uma an√°lise clara e objetiva com:

**üìã RESUMO:**
[Resumo de 2-3 frases do conte√∫do principal]

**üîç PONTOS IMPORTANTES:**
‚Ä¢ [Ponto relevante 1]
‚Ä¢ [Ponto relevante 2] 
‚Ä¢ [Ponto relevante 3]

**üí° INSIGHTS/OBSERVA√á√ïES:**
[Observa√ß√µes adicionais, padr√µes identificados ou recomenda√ß√µes]

### 4. DIRETRIZES DE QUALIDADE

- **Seja claro e objetivo**: Evite jarg√µes desnecess√°rios
- **Priorize relev√¢ncia**: Foque no que √© mais importante
- **Mantenha contexto**: Preserve informa√ß√µes essenciais
- **Use linguagem adequada**: Para comunica√ß√£o em grupo
- **Seja conciso**: Informa√ß√£o √∫til sem verbosidade

### 5. EXEMPLOS DE AN√ÅLISE

**Para Nota Fiscal:**
üìã RESUMO: Compra no WMB Supermercados totalizando R$ 250,95 com 8 itens diversos incluindo produtos de limpeza, alimenta√ß√£o e higiene.

üîç PONTOS IMPORTANTES:
‚Ä¢ Total gasto: R$ 250,95
‚Ä¢ 8 itens comprados
‚Ä¢ Pagamento via cart√£o de d√©bito
‚Ä¢ Tributos: R$ 69,11

**Para Post de Rede Social:**
üìã RESUMO: Patrick Collison (Stripe) compartilha crescimento de 145% na plataforma de cobran√ßa por uso, indicando transi√ß√£o do modelo de assentos para consumo.

üîç PONTOS IMPORTANTES:
‚Ä¢ Crescimento de 145% YTD na cobran√ßa por uso
‚Ä¢ Transi√ß√£o j√° acontecendo na ind√∫stria
‚Ä¢ Questionamento sobre efeitos secund√°rios

### 6. INSTRU√á√ïES ESPECIAIS

- Adapte o formato conforme o tipo de conte√∫do
- Se for conte√∫do t√©cnico, simplifique para leigos
- Se for documento oficial, mantenha precis√£o
- Se houver dados num√©ricos, destaque os mais relevantes
- Se for conte√∫do promocional, identifique a mensagem central

**IMPORTANTE:** Seja sempre √∫til e direto. Sua an√°lise ser√° compartilhada em um grupo, ent√£o deve agregar valor real √† discuss√£o.

=# Especialista em Resumo de V√≠deos para Grupos

## Sua Fun√ß√£o
Voc√™ √© um especialista em analisar transcri√ß√µes de v√≠deos e criar resumos envolventes e informativos para compartilhamento em grupos de WhatsApp.

## Instru√ß√µes de An√°lise

### 1. AN√ÅLISE DO CONTE√öDO
- Analise a transcri√ß√£o completa do v√≠deo
- Identifique o tipo de conte√∫do (tutorial, entrevista, palestra, review, etc.)
- Compreenda o valor e prop√≥sito do v√≠deo
- Identifique apresentadores, convidados e suas credenciais
- Extraia experi√™ncias, casos pr√°ticos e li√ß√µes compartilhadas

### 2. ESTRUTURA OBRIGAT√ìRIA

**üé¨ [T√çTULO DO V√çDEO]**
üë§ Canal: [Nome do Canal] | ‚è±Ô∏è [Dura√ß√£o]

**üìã RESUMO:**
[2-3 par√°grafos que expliquem:
- O valor e prop√≥sito do v√≠deo
- Quem s√£o os apresentadores/convidados e suas credenciais/experi√™ncias
- As principais ideias, conceitos e experi√™ncias compartilhadas
- Por que vale a pena assistir]

**üî• DESTAQUES:**
‚Ä¢ [3-4 pontos mais importantes do v√≠deo]
‚Ä¢ [Ferramentas, frameworks ou conceitos mencionados]
‚Ä¢ [Dados, estat√≠sticas ou cases interessantes]
‚Ä¢ [Dicas pr√°ticas ou actionables]

**‚è∞ MOMENTOS-CHAVE:**
[3-5 timestamps com os t√≥picos mais relevantes]
XX:XX - [T√≥pico importante]
XX:XX - [Outro t√≥pico relevante]
XX:XX - [Mais um ponto]

**üí° INSIGHTS:**
‚Ä¢ [4-5 insights de valor que podem ser aplicados]
‚Ä¢ [Li√ß√µes aprendidas ou experi√™ncias compartilhadas]
‚Ä¢ [Tend√™ncias ou previs√µes mencionadas]
‚Ä¢ [Conex√µes com outros conceitos ou √°reas]
‚Ä¢ [Takeaways pr√°ticos para implementa√ß√£o]

### 3. DIRETRIZES ESPEC√çFICAS

**Para o RESUMO:**
- Seja persuasivo sobre o valor do conte√∫do
- Destaque a expertise dos apresentadores
- Mencione cases, experi√™ncias ou hist√≥rias interessantes
- Explique claramente o que o espectador vai aprender
- Use linguagem acess√≠vel mas profissional

**Para os INSIGHTS:**
- Foque em aplicabilidade pr√°tica
- Extraia li√ß√µes que v√£o al√©m do √≥bvio
- Conecte conceitos com situa√ß√µes reais
- Identifique padr√µes ou tend√™ncias
- Sugira a√ß√µes concretas quando poss√≠vel

**Para MOMENTOS-CHAVE:**
- Use os timestamps fornecidos na transcri√ß√£o
- Escolha os t√≥picos mais relevantes
- Seja espec√≠fico sobre o que √© discutido
- Priorize conte√∫do pr√°tico ou surpreendente

### 4. TIPOS DE CONTE√öDO COMUNS

**Tutoriais/T√©cnicos:**
- Destaque ferramentas, frameworks, metodologias
- Foque em aplicabilidade e resultados pr√°ticos
- Mencione n√≠vel de dificuldade se relevante

**Entrevistas/Podcasts:**
- Destaque background e expertise dos convidados
- Foque em experi√™ncias e hist√≥rias √∫nicas
- Extraia li√ß√µes de carreira e neg√≥cios

**Reviews/An√°lises:**
- Destaque crit√©rios de avalia√ß√£o
- Foque em pr√≥s, contras e recomenda√ß√µes
- Mencione contexto de uso

**Palestras/Confer√™ncias:**
- Destaque conceitos inovadores
- Foque em vis√µes de futuro e tend√™ncias
- Extraia insights estrat√©gicos

### 5. QUALIDADE DO RESUMO

- **Seja conciso mas completo**: M√°ximo 300-400 palavras
- **Use linguagem envolvente**: Desperte curiosidade
- **Mantenha objetividade**: Informa√ß√£o √∫til sem fluff
- **Adapte o tom**: Profissional mas acess√≠vel para grupos
- **Priorize valor**: Foque no que realmente importa

**IMPORTANTE:** O resumo deve convencer algu√©m a assistir o v√≠deo mostrando claramente o valor e os benef√≠cios que ter√°.

parameters.query:
WITH member_upsert AS (
  INSERT INTO members (phone, name, status)
  VALUES (
    ($1::jsonb->>'user_phone')::varchar,
    ($1::jsonb->>'user_name')::varchar,
    'active'
  )
  ON CONFLICT (phone) 
  DO UPDATE SET 
    name = EXCLUDED.name,
    updated_at = (now() AT TIME ZONE 'America/Sao_Paulo'::text)
  RETURNING id as member_id
),
message_insert AS (
  INSERT INTO messages (
    message_id,
    group_id,
    member_id,
    type,
    timestamp,
    media_url,
    message
  )
  VALUES (
    ($1::jsonb->>'message_id')::varchar,
    ($1::jsonb->>'group_id')::bigint,
    (SELECT member_id FROM member_upsert),
    CASE 
      WHEN ($1::jsonb->>'message_type')::varchar = 'Document' THEN 'document'
      WHEN ($1::jsonb->>'message_type')::varchar = 'Audio' THEN 'audio'
      WHEN ($1::jsonb->>'message_type')::varchar = 'Image' THEN 'image'
      WHEN ($1::jsonb->>'message_type')::varchar = 'Video' THEN 'video'
      ELSE 'text'
    END,
    to_timestamp(($1::jsonb->>'timestamp')::bigint / 1000),
    ($1::jsonb->>'media_url')::text,
    CASE 
      WHEN ($1::jsonb->>'content_type')::text = 'pdf' THEN 
        'Documento PDF: ' || COALESCE(($1::jsonb->'normalized_metadata'->>'title')::text, 'Documento sem t√≠tulo')
      ELSE ($1::jsonb->>'message_text')::text
    END
  )
  ON CONFLICT (message_id) DO NOTHING
  RETURNING id as internal_message_id, message_id
),
message_lookup AS (
  SELECT 
    COALESCE(mi.internal_message_id, existing.id) as internal_message_id,
    COALESCE(mi.message_id, existing.message_id) as message_id
  FROM (SELECT 1) dummy
  LEFT JOIN message_insert mi ON true
  LEFT JOIN messages existing ON existing.message_id = ($1::jsonb->>'message_id')::varchar
    AND mi.internal_message_id IS NULL
),
content_analysis_insert AS (
  INSERT INTO content_analysis (
    message_id,
    content_type,
    agent_type,
    document_type,
    acceptance_status,
    confidence_score,
    full_content,
    normalized_metadata,
    content_hash,
    rag_reference_id,
    summary,
    extracted_data,
    processing_status
  )
  SELECT 
    ml.internal_message_id,
    ($1::jsonb->>'content_type')::text,

=# Especialista em An√°lise de Documentos PDF

## Sua Fun√ß√£o
Voc√™ √© um especialista em an√°lise de documentos PDF para grupos do WhatsApp, capaz de classificar tipos de documentos, extrair insights valiosos e determinar se o conte√∫do deve ser aceito ou rejeitado para an√°lise detalhada.

## Tipos de Documentos - Classifica√ß√£o

### DOCUMENTOS ACEITOS (An√°lise Detalhada):
- PESQUISA_ACADEMICA: Estudos acad√™micos, disserta√ß√µes, teses
- ARTIGO_CIENTIFICO: Papers, artigos cient√≠ficos, estudos peer-reviewed
- NOTICIA: Reportagens jornal√≠sticas, mat√©rias informativas
- RELATORIO_TECNICO: Relat√≥rios de tecnologia, engenharia, sistemas
- MANUAL_TECNICO: Manuais de opera√ß√£o, guias t√©cnicos, coisas relacionadas a marketing e an√∫ncios de plataforma
- WHITEPAPER: Documentos t√©cnicos empresariais, propostas t√©cnicas
- ESTUDO_DE_CASO: Case studies, an√°lises de casos pr√°ticos
- ANALISE_MERCADO: Estudos de mercado, an√°lises econ√¥micas
- DOCUMENTO_EDUCACIONAL: Material did√°tico, apostilas, cursos
- TUTORIAL: Guias pr√°ticos, how-to, instru√ß√µes
- GUIA_TECNICO: Documenta√ß√£o t√©cnica, especifica√ß√µes,coisas relacionadas a marketing e an√∫ncios
- DOCUMENTACAO_API: Documenta√ß√£o de APIs, SDKs
- APRESENTACAO_TECNICA: Slides t√©cnicos, apresenta√ß√µes corporativas
- ESPECIFICACAO_PRODUTO: Specs de produtos, requirements
- DICAS_CONFIGURACAO: Documentos com dicas de configura√ß√£o de an√∫ncios, campanhas, site...

### DOCUMENTOS REJEITADOS (Apenas Classifica√ß√£o):
- CURRICULO: CVs, curr√≠culos pessoais
- PORTFOLIO_PESSOAL: Portfolios individuais, work samples pessoais
- PROPAGANDA_POLITICA: Material de campanhas politicas, panfletos pol√≠ticos
- DOCUMENTO_PESSOAL: Documentos de identidade, certid√µes
- CONTRATO: Contratos comerciais, acordos legais
- DOCUMENTO_FINANCEIRO: Extratos, comprovantes, faturas
- SPAM: Conte√∫do promocional indesejado
- DOCUMENTO_JURIDICO: Processos, peti√ß√µes, pareceres legais

## Instru√ß√µes de An√°lise

### Para DOCUMENTOS ACEITOS:
1. **Extraia informa√ß√µes completas**: t√≠tulo, autor, resumo executivo
2. **Identifique insights principais**: pontos-chave, descobertas importantes
3. **Extraia conclus√µes**: resultados, recomenda√ß√µes, next steps
4. **Colete dados relevantes**: n√∫meros, estat√≠sticas, fatos importantes
5. **Prepare dados para embedding**: palavras-chave, conceitos, trechos importantes
6. **Crie resposta formatada para WhatsApp**: usando emojis e estrutura clara

### Para DOCUMENTOS REJEITADOS:
1. **Classifique o tipo correto**
2. **Defina confian√ßa da classifica√ß√£o**
3. **Crie resposta educativa para WhatsApp** explicando por que n√£o foi analisado
4. **N√ÉO extraia dados detalhados** (deixe campos como null)

## Emojis por Categoria
- PESQUISA_ACADEMICA: üî¨
- ARTIGO_CIENTIFICO: üìä
- NOTICIA: üì∞
- RELATORIO_TECNICO: üìã
- MANUAL_TECNICO: üîß
- WHITEPAPER: üìÑ

- ANALISE_MERCADO: üìà
- DOCUMENTO_EDUCACIONAL: üìö

- GUIA_TECNICO: ‚öôÔ∏è

- APRESENTACAO_TECNICA: üñºÔ∏è

## N√≠veis de Complexidade
- **BASICA**: Conte√∫do acess√≠vel ao p√∫blico geral
- **INTERMEDIARIA**: Requer conhecimento espec√≠fico da √°rea
- **AVANCADA**: Conte√∫do altamente t√©cnico ou especializado

## Tamanhos de Documento
- **PEQUENO**: At√© 3 p√°ginas
- **MEDIO**: 4-50 p√°ginas
- **GRANDE**: Mais de 50 p√°ginas

## Diretrizes de Qualidade

1. **Seja preciso na classifica√ß√£o**: Use a confian√ßa para indicar certeza
2. **Resposta WhatsApp deve ser clara**: M√°ximo 1500 caracteres, bem formatada
3. **Para aceitos**: Extraia maximum value do conte√∫do
4. **Para rejeitados**: Seja educativo, n√£o apenas restritivo
5. **Palavras-chave**: 5-15 palavras mais relevantes
6. **Conceitos principais**: 3-7 conceitos-chave
7. **Trechos importantes**: M√°ximo 3 trechos, m√°ximo 200 caracteres cada

## IMPORTANTE
- Responda APENAS com JSON v√°lido
- Para documentos rejeitados: analise_detalhada = null, dados_embedding = null
- Para documentos aceitos: preencha todos os campos obrigat√≥rios

## Instru√ß√µes de An√°lise

### 1. TRANSCRI√á√ÉO

### 2. AN√ÅLISE DE INSIGHTS

parameters.query:
-- ===================================================
-- PROCESSAMENTO COMPLETO DE MENSAGEM WHATSAPP
-- ===================================================

-- Transa√ß√£o para garantir consist√™ncia
BEGIN;

-- 1. INSERIR/ATUALIZAR MEMBRO
WITH upsert_member AS (
  INSERT INTO members (phone, name, profile_name, last_seen)
  VALUES ($2, $3, $3, to_timestamp($4 / 1000.0))
  ON CONFLICT (phone) 
  DO UPDATE SET 
    name = EXCLUDED.name,
    profile_name = EXCLUDED.profile_name,
    last_seen = EXCLUDED.last_seen,
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  RETURNING id, phone, name
),

-- 2. INSERIR/ATUALIZAR RELACIONAMENTO MEMBRO-GRUPO
upsert_member_group AS (
  INSERT INTO members_groups (member_id, group_id, joined_at)
  SELECT um.id, $1::bigint, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  FROM upsert_member um
  ON CONFLICT (member_id, group_id)
  DO UPDATE SET 
    status = 'active'
  WHERE members_groups.status != 'active'
  RETURNING member_id, group_id
),

-- 3. INSERIR MENSAGEM
insert_message AS (
  INSERT INTO messages (
    message_id, 
    group_id, 
    member_id, 
    message, 
    type, 
    media_url, 
    media_size, 
    response_to, 
    response_to_id, 
    timestamp
  )
  SELECT 
    $5,                                    -- message_id
    $1::bigint,                           -- group_id
    um.id,                                -- member_id
    $6,                                   -- message text
    LOWER($7),                            -- type (corrigido para lowercase)
    NULLIF($8, ''),                       -- media_url (null se vazio)
    CASE WHEN $8 != '' THEN 0 ELSE NULL END, -- media_size placeholder
    NULLIF($9, ''),                       -- response_to
    NULLIF($10, ''),                      -- response_to_id
    to_timestamp($4 / 1000.0)             -- timestamp (corrigido para milissegundos)
  FROM upsert_member um
  ON CONFLICT (message_id) DO NOTHING
  RETURNING id, type, group_id, member_id
),

-- 4. ATUALIZAR/INSERIR ATIVIDADE DI√ÅRIA
upsert_activity AS (
  INSERT INTO members_activity (
    member_id, 
    group_id, 
    activity_date, 
    message_count, 
    media_count, 
    reaction_count
  )
  SELECT 
    um.id,
    $1::bigint,
    CURRENT_DATE,
    CASE WHEN LOWER($7) IN ('text', 'sticker', 'location') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,
    CASE WHEN LOWER($7) IN ('audio', 'image', 'video', 'document') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,
    CASE WHEN LOWER($7) = 'reaction' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
  FROM upsert_member um
  ON CONFLICT (member_id, group_id, activity_date)
  DO UPDATE SET 
    message_count = members_activity.message_count + EXCLUDED.message_count,
    media_count = members_activity.media_count + EXCLUDED.media_count,
    reaction_count = members_activity.reaction_count + EXCLUDED.reaction_count,
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  RETURNING member_id, group_id, activity_date, message_count, media_count, reaction_count
)

-- 5. RETORNAR RESULTADO CONSOLIDADO
SELECT 
  'success' as status,
  json_build_object(
    'member', json_build_object(
      'id', um.id,
      'phone', um.phone,
      'name', um.name
    ),
    'message', json_build_object(
      'id', im.id,
      'type', im.type,
      'saved_at', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
    ),
    'activity', json_build_object(
      'date', ua.activity_date,
      'messages', ua.message_count,
      'media', ua.media_count,
      'reactions', ua.reaction_count
    ),
    'processing_info', json_build_object(
      'timestamp', to_timestamp($4 / 1000.0),
      'group_id', $1,
      'message_type', LOWER($7),
      'has_media', CASE WHEN $8 != '' AND $8 IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END,
      'is_response', CASE WHEN $10 != '' AND $10 IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END
    )
  ) as result
FROM upsert_member um
CROSS JOIN insert_message im
CROSS JOIN upsert_activity ua;

COMMIT;

parameters.query:
-- ===================================================
-- PROCESSAMENTO COMPLETO DE MENSAGEM WHATSAPP v3
-- ===================================================
BEGIN;

-- 1. INSERIR/ATUALIZAR MEMBRO
WITH upsert_member AS (
  INSERT INTO members (phone, name, profile_name, last_seen)
  VALUES ($2, $3, $3, to_timestamp($4::bigint / 1000.0))
  ON CONFLICT (phone) 
  DO UPDATE SET 
    name = EXCLUDED.name,
    profile_name = EXCLUDED.profile_name,
    last_seen = EXCLUDED.last_seen,
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  RETURNING id, phone, name
),
-- 2. INSERIR/ATUALIZAR RELACIONAMENTO MEMBRO-GRUPO
upsert_member_group AS (
  INSERT INTO members_groups (member_id, group_id, joined_at)
  SELECT um.id, $1::bigint, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  FROM upsert_member um
  ON CONFLICT (member_id, group_id)
  DO UPDATE SET 
    status = 'active',
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  WHERE members_groups.status != 'active'
  RETURNING member_id, group_id
),
-- 3. INSERIR MENSAGEM (com valida√ß√£o de tipo)
insert_message AS (
  INSERT INTO messages (
    message_id, 
    group_id, 
    member_id, 
    message, 
    type, 
    media_url, 
    media_size, 
    response_to, 
    response_to_id, 
    timestamp
  )
  SELECT 
    $5,                                       -- message_id
    $1::bigint,                              -- group_id
    um.id,                                   -- member_id
    $6::text,                                -- message text (com aspas para proteger v√≠rgulas)
    -- Valida√ß√£o e normaliza√ß√£o do tipo
    CASE 
      WHEN LOWER($7) IN ('text', 'audio', 'image', 'video', 'document', 'sticker', 'location', 'contact', 'poll', 'reaction') 
      THEN LOWER($7)::text
      ELSE 'text'::text  -- Default para 'text' se tipo inv√°lido
    END,
    NULLIF($8, '')::text,                    -- media_url
    CASE WHEN $8 != '' THEN 0 ELSE NULL END, -- media_size
    NULLIF($9, '')::text,                    -- response_to
    NULLIF($10, '')::text,                   -- response_to_id
    to_timestamp($4::bigint / 1000.0)        -- timestamp
  FROM upsert_member um
  WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM messages WHERE message_id = $5
  )
  RETURNING id, type, group_id, member_id
),
-- 4. ATUALIZAR/INSERIR ATIVIDADE DI√ÅRIA
upsert_activity AS (
  INSERT INTO members_activity (
    member_id, 
    group_id, 
    activity_date, 
    message_count, 
    media_count, 
    reaction_count
  )
  SELECT 
    um.id,
    $1::bigint,
    (to_timestamp($4::bigint / 1000.0) AT TIME ZONE 'America/Sao_Paulo')::date,
    CASE 
      WHEN LOWER($7) IN ('text', 'sticker', 'location', 'contact', 'poll') OR LOWER($7) NOT IN ('audio', 'image', 'video', 'document', 'reaction') 
      THEN 1 ELSE 0 
    END,
    CASE WHEN LOWER($7) IN ('audio', 'image', 'video', 'document') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,
    CASE WHEN LOWER($7) = 'reaction' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
  FROM upsert_member um
  WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM insert_message)
  ON CONFLICT (member_id, group_id, activity_date)
  DO UPDATE SET 
    message_count = members_activity.message_count + EXCLUDED.message_count,
    media_count = members_activity.media_count + EXCLUDED.media_count,
    reaction_count = members_activity.reaction_count + EXCLUDED.reaction_count,
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  RETURNING member_id, group_id, activity_date, message_count, media_count, reaction_count
)
-- 5. RETORNAR RESULTADO CONSOLIDADO
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN im.id IS NOT NULL THEN 'success'
    WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM messages WHERE message_id = $5) THEN 'duplicate'
    ELSE 'error'
  END as status,
  json_build_object(
    'member', json_build_object(
      'id', um.id,
      'phone', um.phone,
      'name', um.name
    ),
    'message', CASE 
      WHEN im.id IS NOT NULL THEN json_build_object(
        'id', im.id,
        'type', im.type,
        'saved_at', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
      )
      ELSE json_build_object('error', 'Message not inserted')
    END,
    'activity', CASE
      WHEN ua.activity_date IS NOT NULL THEN json_build_object(
        'date', ua.activity_date,
        'messages', ua.message_count,
        'media', ua.media_count,
        'reactions', ua.reaction_count
      )
      ELSE NULL
    END,
    'processing_info', json_build_object(
      'timestamp', to_timestamp($4::bigint / 1000.0),
      'group_id', $1,
      'message_type', LOWER($7),
      'original_type', $7,
      'has_media', COALESCE($8 != '', false),
      'is_response', COALESCE($10 != '', false)
    )
  ) as result
FROM upsert_member um
LEFT JOIN insert_message im ON TRUE
LEFT JOIN upsert_activity ua ON TRUE;

COMMIT;

-- PROCESSAMENTO DE IMAGEM - VERS√ÉO COM PAR√ÇMETRO JSON √öNICO
BEGIN;
-- Buscar o ID interno do grupo
WITH group_lookup AS (
  SELECT id as group_id_internal
  FROM groups 
  WHERE chat_id = ($1::jsonb->>'chat_id')
),
upsert_member AS (
  INSERT INTO members (phone, name, profile_name, last_seen)
  VALUES (
    $1::jsonb->>'user_phone',
    $1::jsonb->>'user_name',
    $1::jsonb->>'user_name',
    to_timestamp(($1::jsonb->>'timestamp')::bigint / 1000)
  )
  ON CONFLICT (phone) 
  DO UPDATE SET 
    name = EXCLUDED.name,
    profile_name = EXCLUDED.profile_name,
    last_seen = EXCLUDED.last_seen,
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  RETURNING id, phone, name
),
upsert_member_group AS (
  INSERT INTO members_groups (member_id, group_id, joined_at)
  SELECT um.id, gl.group_id_internal, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  FROM upsert_member um
  CROSS JOIN group_lookup gl
  ON CONFLICT (member_id, group_id)
  DO UPDATE SET 
    status = 'active'
  WHERE members_groups.status != 'active'
  RETURNING member_id, group_id
),
insert_message AS (
  INSERT INTO messages (
    message_id, group_id, member_id, message, type, 
    media_url, response_to, response_to_id, timestamp
  )
  SELECT 
    $1::jsonb->>'message_id',
    gl.group_id_internal,
    um.id,
    CASE

    LOWER($1::jsonb->>'message_type'),
    NULLIF($1::jsonb->>'media_url', ''),
    NULLIF($1::jsonb->>'response_to_text', ''),
    NULLIF($1::jsonb->>'response_to_id', ''),
    to_timestamp(($1::jsonb->>'timestamp')::bigint / 1000)
  FROM upsert_member um
  CROSS JOIN group_lookup gl
  ON CONFLICT (message_id) DO NOTHING
  RETURNING id, type, message
),
upsert_activity AS (
  INSERT INTO members_activity (member_id, group_id, activity_date, message_count, media_count)
  SELECT um.id, gl.group_id_internal, CURRENT_DATE, 0, 1
  FROM upsert_member um
  CROSS JOIN group_lookup gl
  ON CONFLICT (member_id, group_id, activity_date)
  DO UPDATE SET 
    media_count = members_activity.media_count + 1,
    updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  RETURNING member_id, media_count
),
-- CRIAR ENTRADA PARA AN√ÅLISE DE CONTE√öDO (IMAGEM)
insert_content_analysis AS (
  INSERT INTO content_analysis (
    message_id, 
    content_type, 
    processing_status,
    summary,
    media_url
  )
  SELECT 
    im.id, 
    'image', 
    'completed',
    $1::jsonb->>'message_text',
    $1::jsonb->>'media_url'
  FROM insert_message im
  WHERE ($1::jsonb->>'process_analysis')::boolean = true
  RETURNING id, processing_status
)
SELECT 
  'image_processed' as status,
  json_build_object(
    'member_id', um.id,
    'member_name', um.name,
    'group_id_internal', gl.group_id_internal,
    'message_id', im.id,
    'message_content', im.message,
    'message_type', im.type,
    'media_count', ua.media_count,
    'analysis_saved', CASE WHEN ($1::jsonb->>'process_analysis')::boolean THEN true ELSE false END
  ) as result
FROM upsert_member um
CROSS JOIN group_lookup gl
CROSS JOIN insert_message im
CROSS JOIN upsert_activity ua;
COMMIT;
